Name: Long Sickle
Description: Increase the range at which wheat is collected

Name: Woodpecker
Description: Pierces through forests when harvesting <sprite name=wood>.

Name: Stonepiercer
Description: Pierces through boulders when harvesting <sprite name=stone>.

Name: Door Kicker
Description: While working in base, go through buildings instead of bouncing off of them.

Name: Time Keeper
Description: Increase harvest clock by {[num]} seconds when part of a harvest.

Name: Sprinter
Description: Increase movement speed while harvesting by {[num]}%

Name: Wheat Master
Description: Increase the harvest clock by {[num]} seconds each time harvesting <sprite name=wheat> (Up to 20 times per harvest)

Name: Wood Master
Description: Increase the harvest clock by {[num]} seconds each time harvesting <sprite name=wood> (Up to 20 times per harvest)

Name: Stone Master
Description: Increase the harvest clock by {[num]} seconds each time harvesting <sprite name=stone> (Up to 20 times per harvest)

Name: Builder
Description: Bouncing on scaffolds in harvest mode adds +{[num]} build points.

Name: Farmer
Description: Increase <sprite name=wheat> gathering speed while working in Farms by {[num]}%

Name: Lumberjack
Description: Increase <sprite name=wood> gathering speed while working in Lumberyards by {[num]}%

Name: Stone Miner
Description: Increase <sprite name=stone> gathering speed while working in Stone Mines by {[num]}%

Name: Gold Digger
Description: When working in a gold mine, mines an additional +{[num]} gold each time the mine is bounced on.
